name: BG59
description:
Far in the future, humans have become the playthings of a powerful being. You have been hired to feed them.

Theme

* It fits the theme because it's in the future(even though it's not futuristic)

* The only thing you ever do in the game is plan for the future, you never play in real time.

Controls:

* Click, drag and release to set up an order for the BG59.

* Press the play button to start time, and press the restart button to, well, restart. You can't create orders while time is running. You can also fast forward and step one frame at a time.

Known issues:

* The web version has very noticable audio delay, this is because if I don't make the audio buffer very large godots audio engine can't seem to handle it. Download the native version if this bothers you.
